participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and nurturing, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I love 3d modelling in my spare time. I am a good swimmer and I enjoy teaching my children to swim. I have been in 2 car crashes in my life. The weather here is very cold, but so beautiful in the spring. I keep in touch with my family a lot.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Curious and adventurous, enjoys simple pleasures and has a light-hearted approach to life.
participant_2.background: I'm a single man who enjoys driving my SUV and eating jello. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm curious what they'd have to say about my life as a tiger. My favorite drink is pepsi. I am allergic to shellfish and cats. I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to this evening?
Hello! Not much, just hanging out at home. How about you?
Same here! I'm just getting over a cold, so I'm trying to rest up.
Oh no! I hope you feel better soon!
Thank you! I'm feeling much better today.
That's good to hear!
What are some of your hobbies?
I enjoy driving my SUV, eating jello, and going to the movies.
Those sound like fun hobbies! I love driving, too. What kind of SUV do you have?
I have a Jeep Cherokee. It's a lot of fun to drive!
I've always wanted to drive a Jeep!
You should! They're great!
Maybe I'll look into getting one one day.
You should! They're a lot of fun!
What are some of your favorite movies?
I like action movies, like the Fast and Furious series.
Those are great movies! I love them!
Me too! They're so much fun to watch!
What are you looking forward to in the future?
I'm looking forward to going on vacation this summer.
That sounds like fun! Where are you going?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about going to the beach.
That sounds like a great idea!
Thanks
